text: is one of the 23 special wards within Tokyo, Japan.Tokyo Metropolitan Government (TMG), "Municipalities within Tokyo" . Retrieved 2012-3-27. The municipality calls itself "Bunkyo City" in English. Bunkyo City . Retrieved 2012-3-27. ==History== On 15 March 1947, the ward of Bunkyō was formed by combining the wards of Hongō and Koishikawa. ==Geography== Bunkyō is in central Tokyo. It borders Shinjuku and Chiyoda on the south. Toshima is on the ward's western border. Kita is on the norther border. Taitō is on the east. ==Related pages == * List of special wards of Tokyo * Capital of Japan ==References== ==Other websites== * Bunkyo website * Tokyo Metropolitan Government, Special wards Category:Wards of Tokyo Category:Settlements in Tokyo Prefecture Category:1947 establishments in Japan
title: Bunkyō
